post_text: Gear Grinders are very excited to be hosting our first robotics meet this Saturday through FTC robotics. We would like to extend an invitation to all who would like to see what FIRST is all about! There will be local colleges present at our meet that will be providing information and ready to answer questions about what their schools have to offer. These colleges include Clinton Community College, Sauk Valley Community College, Black Hawk College, Western Illinois University, UW Platteville, and Morrison Tech. They will be present from 8 am to 12 pm during the meet and robotics matches from 9:30 am to noon in the East Gym.
